title: How to write a letter to your future self - Quora

response.answer_text: Okay, so here is what I would write to my future self. Hey dear, How are you? I know you are better than me, you have learned a lot from life and earned a lot that I had thought of. But I really hope you still have the same values and ethics, you still haven't lost yourself to the race of fame, money and success. You still live your life to the fullest. I love you a lot for your learning spirit, your confidence, your ethics and your way of thinking. Hope that's all the same in you. Am I still living in you? With love, Me…

Just write a letter, like you would for a person. But this time, address it to your future self. Write whatever you feel is needed, and write whatever you want to. Be it advice, warning, tip, reminders — anything. In the future, open up this letter you’ve written for your now-present self and read it.
